items.content_html: TransactX is a modern, lightweight Paytm-like digital wallet app ‚Äî built for seamless peer-to-peer transfers, wallet top-ups, and real-time transaction history. The project is architected as a monorepo using Turborepo, enabling shared code, fast builds, and a scalable developer workflow across the Next.js app and simulated bank-webhook service.
items.title: ganeshburri/TransactX: TransactX is a modern, lightweight Paytm-like digital wallet app ‚Äî built for seamless peer-to-peer transfers, wallet top-ups, and real-time transaction history. The project is architected as a monorepo using Turborepo, enabling shared code, fast builds, and a scalable developer workflow across the Next.js app and simulated bank-webhook service.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
